summary: Completed frontend testing of product page UI improvements and admin image management features. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Most frontend features implemented correctly with minor UI spacing issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Large gap (57px) between product title and price - should be reduced for better visual flow

integration_issues.issue: Delete button click does not immediately remove image from preview
Cropper modal does not close automatically after applying crop

passed_tests: Product page breadcrumb navigation (Home / Products / Category / Product Name)
Product page starts with product title (not category badge)
Product description in separate 'Product Details' section
Buy buttons section has 'Available on' label
Admin edit product modal opens correctly
Existing images display with crop and delete buttons on hover
Crop button opens cropper modal with required elements
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix UI spacing issue between product title and price (reduce 57px gap to ~20px). Fix admin image management: ensure delete button removes images from preview immediately and cropper modal closes after applying crop. Consider adding visual feedback for crop completion.
